item.description:
This is a shelter built on the east side of the mountain around 1903.
It is part of the Monadnock lore. Many have heard about it few have found it. I'm willing to show a small group the location. It requires scrambing down a 100' drop off, it goes down in steps,and hiking through some dense under brush. There's a sign in book. Worth the effort. Will reschedule if raining.

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: MT. Monadnock, Pumpelli's Hut
